summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Oregon Street from the west margin of California Street to 49th Avenue Southwest; 44th Avenue Southwest from West Edmunds Street to West Spokane Street; 46th Avenue Southwest from West Edmunds Street to West Spokane Street; 47th Avenue Southwest from Edmunds Street to West Charlestown Street; 48th Avenue Southwest from West Alaska Street to West Genesee Street; and 49th Avenue Southwest from West Alaska Street to West Oregon Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2775 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
